column5: B. Sc. in Physics, University of Utrecht.
Certificate of Educational Science, U of U.
M.Sc. in Physics (drs.), U of U.

column1: KEY QUALIFICATIONS IN JOB AT CITO:

Within CITO Mr. Hendricx was working as a senior educational assessment expert. He was responsible for the construction and analysis of the National Physics examination for pre-university education and for some other National Examinations.
As a consultant of international projects in Hungary, Romania and Aruba, he trained groups of Hungarian, Romanian and Aruban teachers and professionals in item- and test construction etc.
He was involved some years in The PISA-project as a senior Science adviser.

column3: Consultant for the BIEHONG project in Hungary. Training a group of Hungarian teachers and professionals in item- and test construction etc.
Consultant for the AERo project in Romania. Giving all kinds of assistance to the Education Reform Project.
Consultant in Aruba. Training a group of teachers and professionals in setting up a final examination system and examination program.
Senior Science Adviser in the PISA-project.
May 1rst., mr. Hendricx retired from Cito (FPU)
Physics and Mathematics teacher at a secondary school (Gregorius College in Utrecht) and a Teacher Training College (SOL).
Physics teacher at the pre-university faculty of the University of Utrecht.
Co-worker at Noordhoff Publishers in a team of authors.

column2: Physics teacher at Arentheem College Thomas a Kempis.
